comment: The setvar ` x ` is not free in ` A. x ph ` . This corresponds to the axiom (4) of modal logic. Example in Appendix in [Megill] p. 450 (p. 19 of the preprint). Also Lemma 22 of [Monk2] p. 114. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 12-Oct-2021.)
